QuestData.Title: WANTED: Gryphon 'Nappers
QuestData.Description:
A warning to all gryphon owners!
Do not let your feathered companions out of your sight. We have received numerous reports about gryphons in the area being stolen in the night.
If anybody can track down and stop these thieves, a reward awaits!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Lindel and his partner Silent Boris cannot be allowed to hijack any more gryphons!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Lindel the Snatcher and Silent Boris.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Dandy Jones in Hatherford.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is this about the wanted sign? You better hurry, a good number of hunters are after it as well.
QuestData.RewardText:
I heard the lost gryphon came back!
I guess we've got you to thank, $n.
